Languages: Understands Common and Primordial but cannot speak

Traits.Name: Evasive Agility
Traits.Content: Pérák gains advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that would cause it to be restrained or incapacitated.

Traits.Name: Echoing Escape
Traits.Content: When Pérák takes damage, it can choose to spend its reaction to move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Actions.Name: Whipping Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (4d8 + 7) slashing damage. If Springer, Pérák moves at least 10 feet before making this attack, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or become knocked prone. If the target is knocked prone, Springer can take a bonus action to use Lethal Leap against it.

Actions.Name: Lethal Leap
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target knocked prone. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Echoing Mirage
Actions.Content: Springer, Pérák momentarily creates illusory duplicates of itself for added confusion and defense. Each creature of its choice within 30 feet must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 15 (2d10 + 4) thunder damage and is frightened until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not frightened. This ability recharges on a roll of 5-6 on a D6.
